title: Predicting Top 25 & Smoking Aging Room
itunes:title: Predicting Top 25 & Smoking Aging Room
description:
It’s that time of year again when Cigar Aficionado comes out with their list of Top 25 cigars.. We will share with you our predictions of what we believe their list will be…

Also we will be smoking the Aging Room 356 which was part of The Cigar Authority Care Package for the month of December.

All this and more on The Cigar Authority
